title: [CLIENT] Unable to change region
body:
So, when I opened the client, the region was set to NA (while i play EUNE only). I tried switching it, the client restarts and it's back to NA again, not changed, so I cannot login to the game.

I tried running the client as administrator, and reinstalling the client, same thing keeps happening.
Running on Win10 if its of any help.

Thanks for quick response.

replies.body:
There may be an issue with your config settings that's failing to load you to the correct region.  Try a config reset for the fix:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps!
